title: Major League Cricket Begins With a Bang on Willow by Cricbuzz With Free Sunday Night Matches and Exclusive Broadcast Partnerships
body:
MOUNTAIN VIEW, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Willow by Cricbuzz, offering more live, streaming and on-demand cricket than any other sports service, today announced comprehensive broadcasting plans for the 2024 Major League Cricket (MLC) season. Cricket fans across North America can look forward to unparalleled access to live MLC matches on Willow by Cricbuzz and their regional sports network, in addition to special free-to-view broadcasts on Sunday nights on www.willow.tv, www.cricbuzz.com, the Cricbuzz app, and the Willow app.

In addition to airing all MLC matches on Willow by Cricbuzz, the company has partnered with various regional sports networks to bring regular season matches to local markets. Now, fans can rally behind their hometown teams and root for many of the same players who thrilled them during the USA’s unforgettable ICC T20 World Cup run.

Partnered Regional Sports Networks Include:

Monumental Sports Network (DC Freedom)

YES Network (MI New York)

ROOT SPORTS (Seattle Orcas)

Bally Sports Southwest (Texas Super Kings)

Bally Sports SoCal (LA Knight Riders)

Three Sunday night matches on July 7, 14, and 21 at 8:30 PM EDT will be available for free viewing on Willow by Cricbuzz (www.willow.tv), www.cricbuzz.com, the Cricbuzz app, the Willow app, Sling Freestream, and Fubo TV, providing unprecedented access for fans nationwide, all at no cost.

Free Sunday Night Matches Schedule:

Sunday, July 7: Los Angeles Knight Riders vs. San Francisco Unicorns at 8:30 PM EDT

Sunday, July 14: MI New York vs. Texas Super Kings at 8:30 PM EDT

Sunday, July 21: MI New York vs. Los Angeles Knight Riders at 8:30 PM EDT

“Riding the momentum from the USA’s unforgettable T20 World Cup run, Major League Cricket is poised for a spectacular future,” said Todd Myers, COO of Willow by Cricbuzz. “Our partnerships with regional sports networks provide fans unprecedented access to watch their favorite World Cup players on local teams, critically weaving the sport into the fabric of local communities. The addition of free Sunday night viewings also broadens access, energizing a vibrant and rising fan community eager to support their hometown heroes. This is the beginning of a new chapter in North American cricket, with boundless growth potential.”

About Willow by Cricbuzz

Willow by Cricbuzz is the premier destination for cricket in the United States and Canada, boasting the most comprehensive live, streaming, and on-demand cricket coverage available. Guided by its mission to make cricket globally accessible, Willow by Cricbuzz combines cricket’s rich heritage with innovative broadcasting to offer an unmatched viewing experience.

Dedicated to excellence and innovation, Willow by Cricbuzz provides cricket enthusiasts with HD-quality live streaming, interactive scorecards, and extensive coverage from nearly every major cricket board and tournament worldwide.

Willow by Cricbuzz’s TV network is also available through top providers such as DISH, Sling, Fios, Spectrum, Xfinity, Optimum, DIRECTV, DIRECTV Stream, and FuboTV, and also offers a dedicated streaming app available on all major CTV devices, including Apple TV, Roku, Samsung Smart TVs, Amazon Fire TV, Xbox One, Android TV, Chromecast, Google TV, and more, ensuring fans never miss a moment of the action.

Explore the ultimate cricket experience at www.willow.tv.

About Cricbuzz

Cricbuzz is the global leader in cricket content, accessible across the web, iOS, and Android platforms on mobile and connected TV. Offering 360-degree comprehensive cricket coverage, Cricbuzz delivers ball-by-ball text commentary, compelling video analysis by the best cricket experts worldwide, timely news, match reports, editorials, statistics, rankings, and live match streaming in several regions. With over 125 million monthly active users globally and more than 495 million downloads as of January 2024, Cricbuzz is the largest single sport app in the world.

title: Major League Cricket 2024: When and where to watch, match details, schedule, match date, live streaming information
body:
News

Sports News

Cricket News

Major League Cricket 2024: When and where to watch, match details, schedule, match date, live streaming information

Major League Cricket 2024: When and where to watch, match details, schedule, match date, live streaming information

The second season of Major League Cricket (MLC) has secured a landmark broadcast schedule, reaching millions globally. Willow by Cricbuzz will air all matches in the USA and Canada. MLC has partnered with regional sports networks like YES Network to increase viewership. Matches will also be broadcast in Pakistan, Australia, New Zealand, the Middle East, Africa, the UK, and Ireland. The opening match on July 5th features MI New York vs. Seattle Orcas. An all-star lineup of announcers will enhance the viewing experience.

MLC.

NEW DELHI: The second season of Major League Cricket ( MLC ) has secured a landmark broadcast schedule, ensuring that the tournament reaches millions of households across the globe.

Willow by Cricbuzz, the official broadcaster in the USA and Canada, will air all MLC matches throughout the three-week tournament, offering unparalleled live streaming and on-demand cricket content.

In a strategic move to increase viewership and accessibility in the US market, MLC has forged a new partnership deal with multiple regional sports networks (RSNs).

Select matches will be aired across these RSNs, starting with YES Network. Each RSN will carry all regular season matches of its home MLC team, bringing cricket to a wider sports market and fostering local support within the teams' hometowns.

MLC has also confirmed its international broadcast schedule, extending its reach to cricket-loving nations such as Pakistan, Australia, New Zealand, the Middle East, Africa, the United Kingdom, and Ireland.

Teams:

Texas Super Kings

Los Angeles Knight Riders

Seattle Orcas

MI New York

San Francisco Unicorns

Washington Freedom

The opening match on Friday, July 5th, promises to be a thrilling rematch between the 2023 inaugural winners, MI New York, and the Seattle Orcas, taking place in Morrisville, NC. Later that evening, the Texas Super Kings will face off against the LA Knight Riders at Grand Prairie Stadium, TX, adding to the anticipation and excitement.

MLC has assembled an all-star lineup of announcers, including legendary figures such as Sunil Gavaskar, Wasim Akram, Danny Morrison, Daren Ganga, Pommie Mbangwa, Matthew Hayden, Chris Morris, Natalie Germanos, Scott Stylis, and Mike Haysmen. Their expertise and insights will elevate the viewing experience for fans worldwide.

In addition to the renowned on-air team, MLC will support the development of cricket talent in the United States by welcoming emerging broadcasters Nikhil Uttamchandani, Aaman Patel, and Andrew Leonard (associate cricket expert). Their involvement will provide valuable opportunities for growth and exposure.

Major League Cricket’s broadcast partners:

USA: Willow by Cricbuzz, YES Network and more RSNs to be announced

Canada: Willow by Cricbuzz

Australia and New Zealand: Prime Video

Middle East and North Africa: Cricbuzz

Pakistan: A Sports

Sub-Saharan Africa: ESPN

UK and Ireland: TNT Sports

India: To be announced

Carribean: To be announced

With world-class matches, expert commentary, and a commitment to fostering the growth of cricket in the United States, MLC's second season promises to be a captivating and unforgettable experience for fans globally. The league's dedication to providing entertainment beyond the pitch, with fireworks, giveaways, player interactions, and a vibrant atmosphere, further enhances the overall experience.

title: First daily podcast for US Cricket to launch covering 2024 MLC
body:
The world’s first podcast dedicated to Major League and American cricket is set to launch, covering the 2024 Major League Cricket season.

Major League Cricket is a professional Twenty20 cricket league played in the United States since 2023, with six teams representing major US cities.

The second season of the tournament will begin on 5 July, four days after the conclusion of the 2024 ICC Men’s T20 World Cup. The matches will be played in Grand Prairie Stadium, Texas, and Church Street Park, North Carolina.

Across 20 episodes, the US Cricket Daily podcast sponsored by Clyde Hill Publishing, will feature expert analysis on the day’s play, plus guests from the cricket and entertainment worlds, in a format for both new and die-hard fans.

Hosted by acclaimed journalist and broadcaster Peter Della Penna, with support on the ground from Aaman Patel, widely regarded as one of the most promising young broadcasters in cricket, the podcast is a co-production between Square Cut Productions and Viral Tribe Entertainment.

John Ryley, co-founder of Square Cut says: “T20’s entry into America feels like a long overdue moment – the excitement, razzmatazz, and amazing sporting feats will see the game grow over the next decade.

“This podcast aims to capture the spirit of that T20 game and bring fans closer to the action, the players, and the stories behind the moments.

“By mixing expert analysis, exclusive interviews, and behind-the-scenes access, we hope to create a unique experience that not only informs but also entertains. It’s about building a community and sparking a love for cricket in a new generation of fans.”

Jon O’Donnell, chief executive of Viral Tribe Entertainment adds: “We’re delighted to be collaborating with the team at Square Cut on this incredibly exciting project, and our first venture directly aimed at the US market.

“Major League Cricket in America looks set to skyrocket post the T20 World Cup so we can’t wait to unleash this show to a highly engaged audience and build a whole new community of cricket fans in the US.”

Gregory Shaw, Founder and author at Clyde Hill Publishing says: “Cricket is emerging as one of the most exciting sports in America because it draws on what makes the country itself so exciting — it is a melting pot of talent and ambition.

“In the last century, baseball and cricket attracted large crowds in the U.S., and thanks to the MLC, cricket is again filling American stadiums. This podcast will keep fans informed, and train new ones.”

US Cricket Daily launches on 5 July.

title: Texas Super Kings sign up MethodHub as an Associate Sponsor
body:
Global Technology Services Company

MethodHub Houston office focuses on Energy and HealthCare

MethodHub, a midsize software services company becomes Associate Sponsor of Texas Super Kings

HOUSTON, TEXAS, UNITED STATES, July 3, 2024 /EINPresswire.com/ -- Orlando, Florida based MethodHub will partner the Texas Super Kings for the second edition of the Major League Cricket tournament in the United States of America. The partnership will give MethodHub visibility on the Texas Super Kings’ jersey.

Cricket in the United States is set for accelerated growth following the country’s impressive performance in the recently concluded World Cup. The cricket fever is set to continue with iconic cricketers from around the globe participating in the second season of Major League Cricket, set to begin on Friday (July 5).

“We are super-excited to be part of the Super Kings journey in the United States, our primary market. We probably would be the youngest company to be an associate sponsor for any T20 cricket league team, and certainly the youngest software services company to be one” said Aho Bilam, President and CEO of MethodHub.

“Our focus on energy and healthcare, combined with our significant presence in Texas makes our choice to sponsor Texas Super Kings a very natural and logical decision” said Ravi Shanker, COO of MethodHub.

“This also positions MethodHub amongst the list of software players associating with the League and/ or its participating teams. It helps us get into the consideration set of large enterprises who are big consumers of software services. This benchmarks us against much bigger players” said Sudeep Dewan, Head of Client Engagement.

Mr. Ankit Baldi, Texas Super Kings said “We are delighted to be partnering with MethodHub for this edition of T20 Cricket League. At the Super Kings, we place great value on building long-lasting relationships and contributing to the growth stories of each of our partners. We are confident that our association with MethodHub will produce desirable outcomes for both brands as we grow in this exciting region.”

About MethodHub

MethodHub is a global software services company with operations in the US, Canada, India and Thailand. With over 600 professionals servicing large enterprises in BFSI, HealthCare, Energy and Telecom, MethodHub focuses on Cloud and Data Services, ERP/CRM and Cyber Security. Founded in 2019, MethodHub has 3 offices in the US, 4 delivery canters In India and business offices in Toronto and Bangkok.

LinkedIn: @MethodHubSoftware

Facebook: @methodhubsoft

Twitter: @methodhubsoft

About Texas Super Kings

Texas Super Kings is a cricket team participating in the premier franchise-based domestic T20 cricket competition in the USA. Led by South Africa icon Faf du Plessis and featuring global cricket stars, the Texas Super Kings finished third in the inaugural edition of the competition in 2023.

Instagram, Twitter, Facebook: @TexasSuperKings

title: Major League Cricket 2024 - Squads, Fixtures and All you need to know
body:
The second season of the much awaited Major League Cricket is commencing on the 5th of July with MI New York taking on Seattle Orcas in Church Street Park, Morrisville for the Inaugural match.

Points Table

The Final match of the tournament will be played on the 28th of July at the Grand Prairie Stadium, Dallas.

A total of 6 teams are participating in the Major League Cricket namely, San Francisco Unicorns, Los Angeles Knight Riders, Washington Freedom, Texas Super Kings, Seattle Orcas and MI New York.

MI New York are the defending champions of the tournament. They beat Seattle Orcas in the previous edition's Final match.

A total of 25 matches will be played over the course of 23 days during the MLC 2024. 21 league games will be played in a single round robin format before the tournament will move into the Playoffs. The first 15 league games will be played at the Church Street Park, Morrisville and Grand Prairie Stadium. The last 6 league games and the Playoff matches will be played solely at the Grand Prairie Stadium. The Final match is slated to be played on the 28th of July.

International stars including Pat Cummins, Anrich Nortje, Tim David, Heinrich Klaasen, Nathan Ellis, Josh Inglis, Nicholas Pooran, Rachin Ravindra, Travis Head and Glenn Maxwell are participating in the competition.

We saw some great performers from USA cricket team in the recently concluded T20 World Cup. Domestic players who shone bright in the tournament are also taking part like Saurabh Netravalkar, Nitish Kumar, Andries Gous, Aaron Jones and Steven Taylor.

The first season of the Major League Cricket saw a lot of success and considering the squad strengths of all teams, the upcoming edition also promises to be an entertaining affair.

Last Edition's Stats:

Winners- MI New York

Runners up- Seattle Orcas

Top Run Scorer- Nicholas Pooran, MI New York (388 Runs)

Top Wicket Taker- Trent Boult, MI New York (22 Wickets)

title: Major League Cricket 2024 - Match 1, SO vs MINY and Match 2, LAKR vs TSK - Cricket Betting Tips and Match Predictions: July 5
body:
Here are the Fantasy Cricket Predictions and Betting Tips for the Major League Cricket Match 1- Seattle Orcas vs MI New York and Match 2- LA Knight Riders vs Texas Super Kings, which will be played on the 5th of July at the Church Street Park, Morrisville and the Grand Prairie Stadium, Texas.

Batting Stats T20

LIVE SCORES - Match 1 - Seattle Orcas vs MI New York (Church Street Park, Morrisville)

Current Form MI New York:

MI New York are the defending champions of the Major League Cricket. They beat Seattle Orcas comfortably in the Final match of the last season.

The top run scorer for MI New York in the previous edition was Nicholas Pooran with 388 runs to his name.

The top wicket taker for MI New York in the previous edition was Trent Boult with 22 scalps under his belt.

MI New York have retained their explosive batter Nicholas Pooran as well as Steven Taylor for this year's edition. Their bowling looks strong too with the inclusion of Rashid Khan in the squad. Considering their squad strength, MI New York will start as favorites for winning the tournament.

2. Rashid Khan - One of the best T20 spinners in World Cricket, Khan will be vested with the responsibility of putting a leash on to the opponents with his tight bowling.

Seattle Orcas are the runners up of the Major League Cricket. They lost the Final match of the last edition.

The top run scorer for Seattle Orcas in the previous edition was Quinton de Kock with 264 runs to his name.

The top wicket taker for Seattle Orcas in the previous edition was Cameron Gannon with 11 scalps under his belt.

title: Major League Cricket (MLC) 2024: Schedule, squads, fixtures, live streaming details and all you need to know
body:
MI New York are the defending champions of the Major League Cricket (MLC).

After a successful opening season in 2023, Major League Cricket (MLC) returns once again with its second edition. The upcoming MLC 2024 will be played in the month of July. MI New York won the inaugural edition of the MLC.

In the second edition of the MLC, a total of six teams will play 21 matches in a round-robin format. The first 15 games will be split between two venues: Church Street Park and Grand Prairie Stadium. The last six group stage fixtures and knockout matches are scheduled to be played at Grand Prairie Stadium in Texas.

The six franchises will play against each other once in the league stage. After which, the top four teams will progress to the playoffs. Then the winners of the knockout matches will compete in the championship match.

How many teams will take part in MLC 2024 ?

A total of six teams will take part in the MLC 2024. Four of the six MLC teams are owned by franchises of the Indian Premier League (IPL).

MI New York (Mumbai Indians)

Texas Super Kings (Chennai Super Kings)

LA Knight Riders (Kolkata Knight Riders)

Seattle Orcas (Delhi Capitals)

The other two sides are:

San Francisco

Washington Freedom

When and where will MLC 2024 take place?

The second edition of the MLC will be played between July 5 and 28 in the United States.

Yet to be announced.

Yet to be announced.

title: Shakib undecided about touring India
body:
Bangladesh all-rounder Shakib Al Hasan is uncertain about his availability for the upcoming tour of India, where Bangladesh is scheduled to compete in two Tests and three T20Is from September 19 to October 12, following their series in Pakistan in August.

Shakib stated he will determine his involvement in Bangladesh’s upcoming India tour after fulfilling his commitments in Major League Cricket 2024 and Global T20 League Canada 2024, departing Dhaka for the USA on July 1 to join the Los Angeles Knight Riders in the MLC.

The star all-rounder emphasized that he is focusing only up to the Pakistan tour next month and will assess his readiness thereafter.

“I don’t have many plans. There are two T20 tournaments in front of me one is MLC and the other one is the Global T20 League in Canada and let me see where I stand after playing these two tournaments because I need to understand [how I feel],” Shakib was quoted as saying by Cricbuzz.

“There is international cricket and there is a series against Pakistan, and I am planning till that point of time and not planning beyond that. Now I don’t have time to plan for three-four years and so planning for three to six months is better and later will think about my next plan and so till now I am planning till the Pakistan series,” he added.

Bangladesh is expected to arrive in Pakistan around August 20, with the first Test anticipated to begin on August 25, followed by the second Test in early September.

title: Shakib unsure about India tour participation
body:
Bangladesh all-rounder Shakib Al Hasan is unsure if he'll be part of the upcoming tour of India. Bangladesh are scheduled to play two Tests and three T20Is against India from September 19 to October 12 following their tour of Pakistan in August, where they are slated to play a two-match Test series, reports Cricbuzz.

The 37-year-old Shakib, who left Dhaka for USA on Monday (July 1) to play for the Los Angeles Knight Riders in the upcoming Major League Cricket (MLC), said that he was not thinking too far ahead and until now has planned only up to the tour of Pakistan.

"I don't have many plans. I need to understand [how I feel]," Shakib told reporters at the Airport on Tuesday before departing for the USA.

title: Shakib clarifies Taskin’s team bus absence amidst India tour uncertainty
body:
The 37-year-old left Dhaka on July 1 for the 2024 Major League Cricket where he’s a part of the Los Angeles Knight Riders. Shakib will be playing the Global T20 in Canada and represent the nation in August for a probable two-match away Test series against Pakistan.

"There is international cricket and there is a series against Pakistan and I am planning till that point of time and not planning beyond that. Now I don't have time to plan for three-four years and so planning for three to six months is better and later will think about my next plan and so till now I am planning till the Pakistan series," he added.

"The team bus starts at a certain point and there is a rule for cricketers that team bus does not stop for anyone and if anyone misses it in that case he comes in the next car. The manager's car or a taxi is there and the support of transport was difficult in the West Indies. When Taskin arrived it was five to 10 minutes before the toss and certainly, it was difficult to pick him at that point in the team and it was difficult for him as well," Shakib said.

title: 12 cricketers get NoC from PCB to play abroad
body:
LAHORE: The Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) has issued no-objection certificates (NOCs) to as many as 12 cricketers for playing different leagues and other events abroad.

A spokesman of the PCB said on Tuesday that cricketer Abrar Ahmed has been given NoC for playing Major League Cricket from July 4 to 28, Fakhar Zaman for Caribbean Premier League from August 29 to October 6, Haris Rauf for Major League Cricket from July 5 to 28, Mohammad Amir for County Cricket from July 4 to 20, Mohammad Haris for Lanka Premier League from July 1 to 21, Mohammad Hasnain for Lanka Premier League from July 1 to 21, Salman Ali Agha for Lanka Premier League from July 1 to 21, Shadab Khan for Lanka Premier League from July 1 to 21, Sharjeel Khan for World Championship of Legends from July 3 to 13, Sohaib Maqsood for World Championship of Legends July 3 to 13, Usama Mir for the Hundred for July 23 to August 20 and Zaman Khan has been issued NoC for playing Major League Cricket from July 4 to 28.

title: 'I Don't Have Many Plans': BAN Veteran Shakib Al Hasan's Availability for IND Tour an Uncertainty
body:
Bangladesh’s veteran all-rounder Shakib al Hasan’s availability is uncertain for their upcoming tour of India. The Bangla tigers will take on their next-door neighbours in two Tests and three T20Is which begin from September 19 to October 12.

The all-rounder has already left for the USA on July 1 to take part in the Los Angeles Knight Riders’ upcoming season in Major League cricket. He suggested that he is not thinking too far ahead and remains focused on taking part in MLC followed by Canada’s Global T20 League.

“I don’t have many plans. There are two T20 tournaments in front of me one is MLC and the other one is the Global T20 League in Canada. Let me see where I stand after playing these two tournaments because I need to understand (how I feel),” said Shakib as quoted by Cricbuzz.

READ MORE: From IGI Airport to ITC Maurya Hotel – Delhi Police Provide Security Arrangements for Team India’s Arrival

He does not feel that he has the time to think too far into the future and has resorted to focusing more on the short-term and will think of his next move following the Pakistan tour where they will take part in a two-match Test series.

Shakib’s performances with both bat and ball have certainly not lived up to his lofty standards. He finished the T20 World Cup 2024 with only 111 runs in the seven games he was a part of and his strike rate was disastrous at just 106.73. With the ball, he ended up with just three wickets through the campaign.

READ MORE: PCB Chairman Advised Against Massive Changes in Pakistan Team Due To Pressure From Senior Players

The south-paw has been featuring for the Bangladesh side for quite some time and his recent performances have warranted questions from the likes of Virender Sehwag who questioned whether it was time for him to give his spot to someone younger, keeping the future in perspective.

So far Shakib has not done anything to indicate that he might call time on his international career. He, however, continues to regularly feature in franchise cricket across many leagues and his experience will be key to returning to his best form.

title: PCB issues NOCs to 12 Pakistan cricketers
body:
The Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) has granted no-objection certificates (NOCs) to twelve cricketers, allowing them to participate in international leagues and tournaments.

Pakistan's destructive batter, Fakhar Zaman, will join the Caribbean Premier League, which will be held from August 29th to October 6th.

Left-arm pacer Mohammad Amir will play County Cricket from July 4th to July 20th.

Mystery spinner Abrar Ahmed is scheduled to participate in Major League Cricket, running from July 4th to July 28th. Pacer Haris Rauf will also be in action during the same period, and Zaman Khan is slated to join them in the tournament.

Additionally, Mohammad Haris, Mohammad Hasnain (a non-centrally contracted player), Salman Ali Agha, and Shadab Khan will all participate in the Lanka Premier League from July 1st to July 21st.

Sharjeel Khan and Sohaib Maqsood are slated for the World Championship of Legends, scheduled from July 3rd to July 13th.

Usama Mir will compete in The Hundred, scheduled from July 23rd to August 20th.

Additionally, Pakistan's wicketkeeper-batsman Azam Khan and opening batsman Saim Ayub could not obtain NOCs as they are part of the Guyana Warriors for the upcoming CPL 2024.

title: Short-term plans the way to go, says Shakib
body:
Bangladesh star all-rounder Shakib Al Hasan said he preferred to make short-term plans rather than long-term ones, considering that the 37-year-old is in the twilight of his career.

Shakib left for the USA earlier today to take part in the upcoming season of Major League Cricket, starting on July 6. He will play for the Los Angeles Knight Riders and will then make the journey across the border to play for Bangla Tigers Mississauga in the Global T20 in Canada which will begin on July 25.

Following the back-to-back franchise tournaments, Shakib will be expected to return to national colours in August when Bangladesh will tour Pakistan for a two-match Test series.

"I haven't really planned much. And I don't really have that much time to plan for three-four years. I think that it is good to plan for three months, or six months. So up until now, my planning goes as far as the Pakistan series," Shakib told reporters at the Hazrat Shahjalal International Airport before leaving for the USA on Tuesday.

"I don't have a plan regarding myself. At this moment, I'm looking forward to the two T20 tournaments, one is Major League Cricket for which I'm heading to the USA followed by the Global T20 League in Canada. I'll play these back-to-back tournaments and then will see where things are. After that, there is the Test series against Pakistan. So, my planning is about these three competitions."

Shakib has been going through a lean patch with both bat and ball. While his batting has left a lot to be desired in the past two ICC events (the 2023 ODI World Cup and 2020 T20 World Cup), his ability to strike with the ball, which has rarely come into question throughout his career, has taken a nosedive.

In an abysmal campaign in the recently concluded T20 World Cup, Shakib managed just 111 runs in seven matches at a strike-rate of 106.73. He did score a fifty against the Netherlands in their Super 8 run in the tournament but that was all that one would remember from his campaign. With the ball, he picked up three wickets at an economy rate of 7.50 and it was not until Bangladesh's fourth match of the group-stage against Nepal that the left-arm spinner was able to register his first wicket. He took two in the match and scalped one in a Super 8 fixture against India meaning he went wicketless in five matches in the major event.

The interesting part about Shakib's statement was that he was not particularly keen on long-term plans and it won't be a surprise if he is picky when deciding which matches to play in the upcoming series. There have been a few instances in which Shakib has opted out of Tests in the recent past. Moreover, his sporadic absences have often left the Bangladesh Cricket Board (BCB) struggling to explain the reasoning behind his unavailability. So, BCB would have a hard time planning ahead with Shakib in the mix but the loop of the board chasing the Bangladesh star for his availability may very well continue.

title: Shakib Al Hasan to retire from international cricket? Veteran All-Rounder drops bombshell revelation
body:
Veteran Bangladesh all-rounder Shakib Al Hasan is uncertain about participating in the upcoming tour of India. Shakib Al Hasan said that he is only planning up to the Pakistan series and will reassess his situation after playing in the Major League Cricket (MLC) and Global T20 League in Canada.

Bangladesh is scheduled to play two Tests and three T20Is against India from September 19 to October 12, after their tour of Pakistan in August, where they will play a two-match Test series. The first Test will be played in Chennai on September 19, followed by the second Test in Kanpur on September 27.

Don't Have Many Plans - Shakib Al Hasan

Shakib Al Hasan left Dhaka for the USA on Monday to join the Los Angeles Knight Riders in the upcoming Major League Cricket. The 37-year-old all-rounder mentioned that he has short-term plans of three to six months rather than long-term planning.

"I don't have many plans. There are two T20 tournaments in front of me one is MLC and the other one is the Global T20 League in Canada and let me see where I stand after playing these two tournaments because I need to understand [how I feel]," Shakib told reporters.

"There is international cricket and there is a series against Pakistan and I am planning till that point of time and not planning beyond that. Now I don't have time to plan for three-four years and so planning for three to six months is better and later will think about my next plan and so till now I am planning till the Pakistan series," he added.

Shakib had a disappointing outing with both bat and ball in the recently concluded T20 World Cup 2024. The left-handed batter scored 111 runs in seven matches at an average of 18.50 and a strike rate of 106.73. The left-arm spinner managed to secure three wickets at an economy rate of 7.50 in the World Cup.

It Was Difficult To Pick Taskin Ahmed - Shakib Al Hasan

Shakib Al Hasan revealed that pace bowler Taskin Ahmed apologized to his teammates for missing the game against India. Shakib stated that Taskin arrived just minutes before the toss, making it challenging to include him in the team.

"When Taskin arrived it was five to 10 minutes before the toss and certainly it was difficult to pick him at that point in the team and it was difficult for him as well. Taskin apologized to the team for that afterward and everyone in the team took it normally because a man can mistakes and anyone can commit unintentional mistakes and he accepted it and the thing ended at that point in time," Shakib said.

Bangladesh made a questionable team selection by excluding vice captain Taskin Ahmed in the Super 8 fixture against India. According to Cricbuzz, Taskin missed the match due to arriving late because of oversleeping. He returned for the next match against Afghanistan and took one wicket for 12 runs in his four overs.

Bangladesh were eliminated from the World Cup without securing a single victory in the Super Eight stage during the World Cup in the West Indies and the United States of America (USA). The Bangladesh team lost to Australia, India, and Afghanistan in the Super 8 matches.

title: Major League Cricket 2024: 3 Reasons Why MI New York Can Defend Their Title
body:
The inaugural edition of the Major League Cricket saw MI New York win the title in the finals after they beat Seattle Orcas by 7 wickets. It was glory and triumph in equal numbers as they etched history to win the first-ever Major League Cricket title.

The core of the team remains the same as the likes of Nicholas Pooran, Kieron Pollard and Trent Boult will be the key members to watch out for. Undoubtedly, they have one of the strongest and most formidable sides in this competition.

Several USA cricketers in the form of Monank Patel, Steven Taylor and Shayan Jahangir will be players to watch out for as Kieron Pollard and co. look to defend their title.

In this article, we take a look at 3 reasons why MI New York can defend their title in Major League Cricket 2024:

1. Well-rounded balanced side

MI New York have a lot of superstars in their team and all of them would be looking to sparkle together in order to win something big in the 2nd edition of the Major League Cricket 2024.

The batting department has some big guns in the form of Nicholas Pooran, Tim David and Kieron Pollard. On the other hand, the bowlers in the form of Anrich Nortje, Kagiso Rabada, Trent Boult and Sunny Singh will be looking to leave a mark.

2. Able leadership

MI New York’s captain Kieron Pollard has served the Mumbai-branch of the MI franchise for 14 long seasons and is also the present batting coach of Mumbai Indians. He is a vastly experienced campaigner and has won a lot of titles in this T20 franchise cricketing career.

Pollard had sustained a shoulder injury in the last league game of MI New York in the previous edition and therefore Nicholas Pooran, had to don the captain’s hat.

The swashbuckling southpaw led the team extremely well and also played a jaw-dropping innings in the finals to lift the title. Pooran had smashed 137* runs in 55 deliveries and had sent shockwaves down the spines of the opposition team.

3. Quality domestic talent

MI New York have USA’s cricket team’s captain Monank Patel in their ranks and also have Steven Taylor. Both these players had a good outing in the ICC T20 World Cup 2024 and would be confident of good performances in this competition.

Left-arm orthodox spinner Nosthush Kenjige will be another key talent to watch out for and he has grown in confidence, in the last few years. Kenjige had bagged 3 wickets in the ICC T20 World Cup 2024 for USA.

title: Shakib Al Hasan uncertain for India vs Bangladesh series: Focus on T20 Leagues and Pakistan tour
body:
Shakib Al Hasan, the renowned Bangladesh all-rounder, is uncertain about his participation in the upcoming India vs Bangladesh series. The series, scheduled from September 19 to October 12, includes two Tests and three T20Is. This uncertainty follows Bangladesh’s tour of Pakistan in August, where they will play a two-match Test series.

Focus on T20 Leagues: Shakib Al Hasan

Shakib al Hasan, who departed for the USA on July 1 to play for the Los Angeles Knight Riders in the Major League Cricket, stated that his current plans only extend to the Pakistan tour.

“I don’t have many plans. There are two T20 tournaments ahead: the MLC and the Global T20 League in Canada. I’ll reassess my position after these tournaments,” Shakib told reporters before leaving for the USA as per Cricbuzz.

He emphasised the need for short-term planning given his age and experience. “Planning for three to six months is more realistic for me now, and I’ll decide on my next steps after the Pakistan series,” he added.

Taskin Ahmed apology confirmed by Shakib

In related news, Shakib Al Hasan confirmed that pace bowler Taskin Ahmed had apologised to his teammates for missing the team bus ahead of their Super 8 clash against India in the ICC T20 World Cup. Taskin’s tardiness led to his late arrival at the Sir Vivian Richards Stadium in Antigua, missing the game against India.

“The team bus leaves at a fixed time, and if a player misses it, they must find alternate transportation. Taskin arrived just minutes before the toss, making it impossible to include him in the playing XI,” Shakib explained. “Taskin apologised to the team, and everyone accepted it as an honest mistake.”

Future Plans and Senior Farewells

BCB President Nazmul Hasan indicated that the board is planning a fitting farewell for senior players Tamim Iqbal, Mushfiqur Rahim, Shakib Al Hasan, and Mahmudullah, who are nearing the end of their careers.

title: Top 5 batters who can be the highest run-getters in MLC 2024
body:
The Major League Cricket, MLC 2024 is knocking at the doorstep, as the second edition of the tournament begins on Saturday. With its inaugural season played in 2023, the MI New York were the standout performers in the league and went on to be the champions under skipper Nick Pooran, who played a stunning hand in their title victory.

With some very crucial signings, especially with the drafting of several Australian maestros ahead of the 2nd edition, the MLC will be a contest worth witnessing.

With a new set of players, along with the retained players from the first season, let’s take a look at the Top 5 batters who stand a chance to score the highest runs ahead of MLC 2024.

Table of Contents

Top 5 batters who stand a chance to score the highest runs ahead of MLC 2024

Marcus Stoinis

The Texas Super Kings have drafted the big Australian for their 2024 MLC campaign. The last time semifinalists had already had quite some spectacular performers in their team sheets, while Stoinis will be an in-form inclusion to the side.

The big Australian was a commanding performer in the Indian Premier League and also performed overwhelmingly for his national side in the T20 World Cup. Stoinis, who has evolved to be a middle-order batter, letting go of his role as a finisher has helped sides retain him, and his evolving bowling skills are a cherry on top.

Quinton de Kock

The South African veteran, who announced his retirement from the Tests and ODIs, has been a constant surprise in the shortest format of the game. He has been a part of every global T20 league since he stopped featuring for the Proteas.

Playing for the Seattle Orcas, QDK scored 264 runs, averaging a brilliant 44 in the 7 games of the tournament. He is one of the most worthy retentions of the MLC 2024, and his contributions are supposed to be of great value to his team. In short, the veteran can once again be found among the top scorers of the league.

YOU MAY LIKE IT: IND vs ZIM: 3 bowlers to watch out for in India’s tour of Zimbabwe who can be assets in the T20 World Cup 2026

J.Fraser-McGurk

The hard-hitting youngster from Australia is now gaining the status of a world-class T20 batter due to his fearless stride and fast run-scoring in the powerplay, for which he has often received praise and recognition from players around the world.

Featuring for the Delhi Capitals in the IPL 2024, McGurk was one of the very reasons the Capitals bounced back in the later stages of the competition. Though he was not the most consistent performer, he added fire to the innings whenever he got going in the powerplay.

Such will be his role, as the 21-year-old is about to make his debut in yet another league featuring players of global standard. Picked by the San Francisco Unicorns, McGruk will be most probably seen alongside Finn Allen, and together they can be the most explosive opening pair of MLC 2024.

Nicholas Pooran

The West Indies wk-bat has been a constant performer over the recent few years, in whichever league he has played in. From playing in the IPL for Lucknow Super Giants to making vital contributions to his team’s score in the T20 World Cup, Pooran is one of the most reliable batters to keep your cards on.

The small-packet dynamite is often seen hitting massive sixes; it was his blistering knock of 137 runs on just 55 balls that included 13 sixes, which took MI New York over the line, and they went on to be the champions of the debut season. Not only MI New York but the entire cricket world would hope to witness such brilliance from the Windies batter.

Travis Head

title: Major League Cricket Season 2 Schedule Live streaming, format
body:
Major League Cricket Season 2 Schedule 2024

Major League Cricket Season 2 Schedule: There is good news for all cricket lovers in United States and all around the world, as the Major League Cricket (MLC) will begin on July 6 (IST).

The Major League Cricket will consist of 19 matches, beginning on July 6 and concluding on July 29. Church Street Park in Morrisville and Grand Prairie Stadium in Dallas are the two venues which will host all 25 games of the MLC season 2.

The league will feature some of the most prominent players, like Pat Cummins, Quinton de Kock, Andre Russell, David Miller, Faf du Plessis, Marcus Stoinis, Jake Fraser-McGurk, Travis Head, Glenn Maxwell, Nicholas Pooran, Trent Boult, Lungi Ngidi, Rachin Ravindra, and Shimron Hetmyer to name a few.

MI New York won the inaugural edition of the MLC last year by beating Seattle Orcas in the final match. Both the teams will play the season opener of the second edition on July 6.

How many teams are participating in Major League Cricket?

Six teams, including San Fransisco Unicorns, Los Angeles Knight Riders, Texas Super Kings, Washington Freedom, MI New York, Seattle Orcas – will compete in the 2024 Major League Cricket.

What is the format of Major League Cricket?

The six teams will fight in a round-robin format for 21 matches.

The playoffs, which begin on July 24 includes the eliminator and Qualifier 1, will be contested by top four teams in the standings after the round-robin play.

Similar to the Indian Premier League’s playoffs, the top two teams will play in Qualifier 1 to earn a direct spot in the final, while the third and fourth-placed teams will play in the Eliminator on July 24.

The victor of the Eliminator will face the loser of qualifier 1 in challenger to secure a place in Major League Cricket’s final match.

title: Major League Cricket 2024:Team, Player List, Schedule, Venue, and More
body:
The major league cricket season is a twenty over format which is ready for its another season set to begin from July 5 2024, managed and organized by the American Cricket Enterprises for USA cricket. Sponsored by Cognizant, this year will mark the second edition of the exciting franchise twenty 20 cricket league which was established in the 2019.

Set to run from July 5 to July 28, 2024, the tournament will feature six teams competing in a round-robin format, with MI New York returning as the defending champions. The matches will be hosted at two prominent venues: Grand Prairie Stadium in Grand Prairie, Texas, and Church Street Park in Morrisville, North Carolina. This season will begin right after the ICC World Cup which will help cricket fans to be filled with cric-entertainment, so get ready to feel the thrilling moments from massive sixes to sensational catches showcasing top-tier cricket talent on American soil.

MLC 2024 Teams

A total of six teams would be seen participating in the tournament which will compete in the total of matches in the league tournament and then the top four will qualify for the Semi-Finals or finale of the series.below mentioned are teams of MLC 2024:

Los Angeles Knight Riders

MI New York

Seattle Orcas

Texas Super Kings

Washington Freedom

The teams for MLC 2024 have entrusted the responsibility of mentorship to their most skilled players—the captains. Each team has put their best bet on the captains who bring a unique set of skills, experience, and leadership qualities to lead their teams to the ultimate test of champions—the Finals. MLC 2024 Schedule, Date and Times

MLC 2024 Tournament Format

The MLC Tournament is a twenty over format tournament which will take place in the round robin format where each team will play against one another and then they will move to playoff matches scheduled for July 25, 2024. After competing in the league matches the teams will face each other in the playoff matches.

The top two teams on the points table will get on head to head battle with each other in the Qualifier 1 match scheduled on the 25th july 2024 and the next two teams on the points table will get in head to head clash with each other in the Eliminator match scheduled to take place in Dallas on the 26th July 2024. The winner of the qualifier 1 will directly qualify for the finale match but the loser will get another chance to compete with the winner of the eliminator match in the Qualifier 2, the team who wins the Qualifier2 (Challenger match) becomes the team to enter in the final battle against winner of the Qualifier 1 team.

MLC 2024 Points Table

The performances of the team is displayed on the points table with the net runs rate, wins loss, past foure match records, the top performing teams will be moving in the tournament ahed and the teams on the bottom will fail to make it to the playoffs. The top two teams on the table will move to qualifier 1 and the next two teams will be playing the eliminator match.All teams currently stand with zero matches played, zero wins, zero losses, and zero points. MLC 2024 Venue

The matches of the MLC 2024 are set to take place at the two different venues which are located in the USA only.
